thread.title: Crash closes I-93 just north of Massachusetts border
thread.title_full: Crash closes I-93 just north of Massachusetts border

title: Crash closes I-93 just north of Massachusetts border
text: Deadly crash on I-93 just north of Massachusetts border in New Hampshire Deadly crash on I-93 just north of Massachusetts border in New Hampshire TO OFFER. ALL LANES OF 93 SOUTH IN SALEM, NEW HAMPSHIRE ALSO SHUT DOWN. RIGHT NOW, AT LEAST TWO CARS ARE BADLY DAMAGED FROM THIS CRASH. NEW HAMPSHIRE STATE POLICE SAY SEVERA Advertisement Deadly crash on I-93 just north of Massachusetts border in New Hampshire One person was killed Thursday night in a crash that forced the hours-long closure of all southbound lanes of Interstate 93, just north of the Massachusetts border. The crash, which involved at least two vehicles, occurred around 4:30 p.m. in Salem, New Hampshire, between Exit 1 and the state line. 5 Alert Traffic MapOne person is dead, police confirmed to WMUR after 7:30 p.m. The southbound lanes began to reopen a little over an hour later. Numerous state troopers, ambulances from Salem and Windham and tow trucks responded to the crash. SALEM, N.H. â€” One person is dead, police confirmed to One person was killed Thursday night in a crash that forced the hours-long closure of all southbound lanes of Interstate 93, just north of the Massachusetts border. The crash, which involved at least two vehicles, occurred around 4:30 p.m. in Salem, New Hampshire, between Exit 1 and the state line. Advertisement One person is dead, police confirmed to [WMUR](https://www.wmur.com/article/salem-new-hampshire-i93-crash-21/46617745) after 7:30 p.m. The southbound lanes began to reopen a little over an hour later. Numerous state troopers, ambulances from Salem and Windham and tow trucks responded to the crash.
